education_text.0: Born in      New York City New York City, Goldwasser obtained her      Bachelor of Science Bachelor of Science degree in 1979 in mathematics and science from      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie MellonGoldwasser joined      Massachusetts Institute of Technology MIT in 1983, and in 1997 became the first holder of the RSA ProfessorshipGoldwasser's research areas include      Computational complexity theory computational complexity theory,      cryptography and      Computational number theory computational number theoryIn 2018, Goldwasser was awarded an honorary degree by her alma mater,      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University
